title: EYEHATEGOD: CANCEL FALL 2015 U.S. TOUR
content:
New Orleans, Louisiana sludge/doom metal legends EYEHATEGOD have CANCELLED the bands FALL 2015 U.S. tour. EYEHATEGOD are STILL set for HOUSECORE HORROR FILM FEST 2016.   EYEHATEGOD unleashed the bands self titled  5/27/2014 (NORTH AMERICA), 5/26/2014 (EUROPE, AUSTRALIA, NEW ZEALAND, ) via CENTURY MEDIA RECORDS,  5/21/2014 (JAPAN) via DAYMARE RECORDS.
                                                                                                                                                      EYEHATEGOD's drummer JOEY LACAZE  passed away 8/23/2013 at 42 years old. JOEY LACAZE's cause of death has been revealed as "respiratory failure, from asthma".
DALE CROVER of the MELVINS filled in on drums for the late JOEY LACAZE at the HOUSE CORE HORROR FILM FEST.
EYEHATEGOD have introduced new drummer AARON HILL.
FROM EARSPLIT PR:
http://www.earsplitcompound.com/site/2015/09/08/eyehategod-forced-to-cancel-september-shows/
Thanks-Stay Metal, Stay Brutal-\m/ -l-
